text: The Constitutional Tribunal () is the constitutional court of the Republic of Poland. It is a judicial body create to solve issues on the constitution of the country. It was created on 26 March 1982 and judges took office on 1 January 1986. ==References== Category:1982 establishments in Europe Category:1980s establishments in Poland Category:Government of Poland Category:Organizations based in Poland Category:Courts (law)
title: Constitutional Tribunal (Poland)
